20110115020053.000|20110115020055.000|CC1|SECRETARY YUKIO EDANO ANNOUNCED 
20110115020055.000|20110115020057.000|CC1|THE NEW MINISTERS.              
20110115020057.000|20110115020059.000|CC1|HE IS A 46-YEAR-OLD LAWYER IN   
20110115020059.000|20110115020100.000|CC1|THE FORMER HATOYAMA GOVERNMENT. 
20110115020100.000|20110115020101.000|CC1|HE LED EFFORTS TO ELIMINATE     
20110115020101.000|20110115020102.000|CC1|WASTEFUL GOVERNMENT SPENDING.

20110115020103.000|20110115020105.000|CC1|AND FISCAL POLICY MINISTER.

20110115020106.000|20110115020109.000|CC1|PRIORITY POLICY OF REFORMING THE
20110115020109.000|20110115020111.000|CC1|SOCIAL SECURITY AND TAX SYSTEM.

20110115020113.000|20110115020114.000|CC1|CONSUMPTION TAX AND FISCAL

20110115020120.000|20110115020121.000|CC1|FOREIGN MINISTER SEIJI MAEHARA,

20110115020712.000|20110115020715.000|CC1|BECAUSE MANY OF THEM WERE PART

20110115020719.000|20110115020721.000|CC1|>> NOW WHAT DOES THE FUTURE HOLD

20110115020723.000|20110115020724.000|CC1|>> WELL, BY GETTING RID OF THE  
20110115020724.000|20110115020726.000|CC1|MINISTERS, WHO HAVE BEEN        
20110115020726.000|20110115020727.000|CC1|CENSURED BY THE OPPOSITION

20110115020734.000|20110115020738.000|CC1|THAT START LATER THIS MONTH.

20110115020741.000|20110115020743.000|CC1|UNPOPULAR POSITIONS, BUT IT WILL
20110115020743.000|20110115020744.000|CC1|STILL BE HARD FOR KAN TO WIN    
20110115020744.000|20110115020745.000|CC1|SUPPORT FROM THE OPPOSITION TO  
20110115020745.000|20110115020748.000|CC1|PASS THE BUDGET IN THIS DIVIDED 
20110115020748.000|20110115020751.000|CC1|DIET.                           
20110115020751.000|20110115020753.000|CC1|KAN STILL HAS TO FACE THE RISK

20110115020755.000|20110115020756.000|CC1|APRIL AND LOSING POWER, OR BEING

20110115020815.000|20110115020816.000|CC1|>>> THE U.S. DEFENSE SECRETARY  
20110115020816.000|20110115020819.000|CC1|HAS URGED NORTH KOREA TO TAKE   
20110115020819.000|20110115020821.000|CC1|STEPS TO ABANDON OLD MILITARY   
20110115020821.000|20110115020822.000|CC1|PROVOCATION INCLUDING ITS       
20110115020822.000|20110115020824.000|CC1|NUCLEAR DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM.    
20110115020824.000|20110115020827.000|CC1|ROBERT GATES MADE THE COMMENT ON
20110115020827.000|20110115020830.000|CC1|FRIDAY IN SEOUL.                
20110115020830.000|20110115020832.000|CC1|IN A MEETING WITH SOUTH KOREAN  
20110115020832.000|20110115020834.000|CC1|DEFENSE MINISTER, GATES         
20110115020834.000|20110115020835.000|CC1|REITERATED THERE WILL BE NO     
20110115020835.000|20110115020837.000|CC1|RESUMPTION OF THE SIX PARTY     
20110115020837.000|20110115020837.000|CC1|TALKS IN THE NORTH KOREAN       
20110115020837.000|20110115020838.000|CC1|NUCLEAR ISSUE UNLESS THE COUNTRY
20110115020838.000|20110115020841.000|CC1|TAKES CONCRETE ACTION.          
20110115020841.000|20110115020842.000|CC1|HOWEVER, THE DEFENSE SECRETARY  
20110115020842.000|20110115020843.000|CC1|SAID THERE IS A POSSIBILITY FOR 
20110115020843.000|20110115020843.000|CC1|A PATH TOWARD DIPLOMATIC        
20110115020843.000|20110115020847.000|CC1|DIALOGUE WITH THE NORTH.        
20110115020847.000|20110115020851.000|CC1|>> WITH REGARD TO NEXT STEPS ON 
20110115020851.000|20110115020852.000|CC1|NORTH KOREA, DIPLOMATIC         
20110115020852.000|20110115020853.000|CC1|ENGAGEMENT IS POSSIBLE, STARTING
20110115020853.000|20110115020854.000|CC1|WITH DIRECT ENGAGEMENT BETWEEN  
20110115020854.000|20110115020858.000|CC1|THE DPRK AND THE SOUTH.         
20110115020858.000|20110115020900.000|CC1|>> GATES EXPRESSED CONCERN OVER 
20110115020900.000|20110115020901.000|CC1|A GROWING TENSIONS ON THE KOREAN
20110115020901.000|20110115020903.000|CC1|PENINSULA FOLLOWING THE SINKING 
20110115020903.000|20110115020904.000|CC1|OF A SOUTH KOREAN NAVAL VESSEL

20110115020906.000|20110115020907.000|CC1|ATTACK ON THE SOUTH KOREAN      
20110115020907.000|20110115020909.000|CC1|ISLAND IN NOVEMBER.             
20110115020909.000|20110115020910.000|CC1|HE SAID THE TWO COUNTRIES SHOULD

20110115020913.000|20110115020914.000|CC1|FURTHER TO STEM FRESH

20110115020916.000|20110115020917.000|CC1|MEANWHILE, PRESIDENT LEE        
20110115020917.000|20110115020918.000|CC1|MYUNG-BAK TOLD GATES THIS YEAR  
20110115020918.000|20110115020920.000|CC1|IS CRUCIAL FOR RESOLVING ISSUES 
20110115020920.000|20110115020921.000|CC1|BETWEEN THE TWO KOREAS.         
20110115020921.000|20110115020924.000|CC1|LEE SAID HIS COUNTRY WILL WORK  
20110115020924.000|20110115020928.000|CC1|WITH THE U.S. TO DO ALL IT CAN. 
20110115020928.000|20110115021018.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110115020928.000|20110115020930.000|CC1|>>> IN BRAZIL, THE DEATH TOLL   
20110115020930.000|20110115020930.000|CC1|FROM FLOODS AND MUD SLIDES      
20110115020930.000|20110115020933.000|CC1|TRIGGERED BY TORRENTIAL RAINS   
20110115020933.000|20110115020934.000|CC1|HAS TOPPED 500 IN THE REGION

20110115022656.000|20110115022657.000|CC1|A FAMOUS PILGRIMAGE SITE FOR    
20110115022657.000|20110115022657.000|CC1|SINGLES HOPING TO MEET A        
20110115022657.000|20110115022702.000|CC1|LIFE-LONG PARTNER.              
20110115022702.000|20110115022703.000|CC1|ON THURSDAY, FOUR SPECIALISTS   
20110115022703.000|20110115022705.000|CC1|BEGAN WORK ON THE 600 SQUARE    
20110115022705.000|20110115022707.000|CC1|METER ROOF OF THE HALL, A       
20110115022707.000|20110115022709.000|CC1|DESIGNATED NATIONAL TREASURE.   
20110115022709.000|20110115022710.000|CC1|THEY ATTACHED THIN SHEETS MADE  
20110115022710.000|20110115022711.000|CC1|FROM JAPANESE CYPRESS TREES     
20110115022711.000|20110115022715.000|CC1|USING BAMBOO PEGS.              
20110115022715.000|20110115022715.000|CC1|THE SHEETS WERE SOAKED IN WATER 
20110115022715.000|20110115022718.000|CC1|TO SOFTEN THEM.                 
20110115022718.000|20110115022720.000|CC1|SOME ARE 1.2 METERS LONG, FOUR  
20110115022720.000|20110115022722.000|CC1|TIMES THE LENGTH OF THE MATERIAL
20110115022722.000|20110115022725.000|CC1|USED AT OTHER SHRINES.          
20110115022725.000|20110115022727.000|CC1|>> Translator: IT IS THE FIRST  
20110115022727.000|20110115022729.000|CC1|TIME I DO THIS JOB, SO THERE IS 
20110115022729.000|20110115022730.000|CC1|QUITE A BIT OF TRIAL AND ERROR  
20110115022730.000|20110115022733.000|CC1|BUT I'M REALLY ENJOYING IT.     
20110115022733.000|20110115022734.000|CC1|>> WORK ON THE ROOF ITSELF WILL 
20110115022734.000|20110115022736.000|CC1|TAKE ONE YEAR.

20110115022737.000|20110115022740.000|CC1|SHRINE BEGAN THREE YEARS AGO AND
